alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:14AM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Fleming County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow could come down at rates of at least an inch per hour at times during Thursday afternoon to early Thursday evening. Visibilities of a quarter of a mile or less will be possible at times Thursday afternoon to early Thursday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
